incidents.name: Workflow Execution Status Available in the Workflow Report

incident_updates.body:
We have completed our investigation of the issue, identified the root cause, and remediated the underlying issue, which impacted a subset of customer Workflow instances executed between 1:30AM EST May 25th and 7:00PM EST May 29th and resulted in an accurate workflow action status in the instance's Workflow Report but an inaccurate Workflow status in the Workflow Activity Feed. 

Customers may see duplicate instance IDs of impacted Workflows with the original targets appear in the Workflow Activity Feed. 

We apologize for any inconvenience this issue may have caused. If you have any questions, please contact Support: support@bettercloud.com.

We are continuing to investigate an issue impacting a subset of customers' workflow instances. The issue is resulting in the display of an inaccurate workflow status in the Workflow Activity Feed for workflows executed on or since May 25, 2023.

Customers can review the accurate status of their workflow instance's actions by navigating to Workflows > Activity Feed > and clicking into a specific Workflow instance ID to view the Action execution history. Impacted Workflows will have an "incomplete" status next to Actions that were not successfully completed. 

We apologize for any inconvenience and will provide another update as soon as possible. If you have any questions, please contact Support: support@bettercloud.com.

We are currently investigating an issue impacting a subset of customers’ workflow instances. The issue is resulting the display of an inaccurate workflow status in the Workflow Activity Feed for workflows executed in the last 20 hours.

Customers can review the accurate status of their workflow instance's actions by navigating to Workflows > Activity Feed > and clicking into a specific Workflow instance ID to view the Action execution history. Impacted Workflows will have an "incomplete" status next to Actions that were not successfully completed.

We apologize for any inconvenience and will provide another update as soon as possible. If you have any questions, please contact Support: support@bettercloud.com.

We have resolved the issue that was affecting certain event-based workflows and alerts in BetterCloud. The impacted events have been reprocessed and customers may notice a duplicate alert or workflow. We appreciate your patience! If you have any questions, please contact Support: support@bettercloud.com

incidents.name: Workflow/Action Limited Outage on Monday, May 8th

incident_updates.body: We have resolved the issue that was affecting Workflows and Actions failing to trigger for a limited number of customers on May 8th between 9pm - 11:19pm ET, and reprocessed all Workflows and Actions that were affected. We appreciate your patience! If you have any questions, please contact Support: support@bettercloud.com

We are currently investigating reports of Workflows and Actions failing to trigger for a limited number of customers on May 8th between 9pm - 11:19pm ET. We are actively reprocessing all Workflows and Actions that were affected. We will provide another update as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience here. Please reach out to our Support team by emailing support@bettercloud.com if you have any questions.

We have identified the issue that resulted in Workflow Actions being delayed for a limited number of customers. Workflows containing the Google "Transfer All Drive Files" Action were not completing as expected, causing subsequent Actions in those Workflows to be delayed in executing. All affected Workflows have progressed past this specific Action and should be completed as expected. We are monitoring to ensure this Action is stable going forward.

We apologize for any inconvenience this issue may have caused. If you have any questions, please contact our Support Team at support@bettercloud.com.

We are currently investigating an issue that is resulting in Workflow Actions delays for a limited number of customers. Specifically, the issue is preventing the Google “Transfer All Drive Files” Action from completing as expected, and is delaying the subsequent actions in the impacted workflows as a result. At the moment, we're working to determine root cause, and we've asked our partners at Google to look into a potential issue; however, we are working to mitigate the impact on our customers. We will provide additional updates here as we work towards a resolution. If you have any questions, please contact our Support Team at support@bettercloud.com.

All impacted customers have received email notifications and are advised to reconnect their integrations. We will provide further updates as they become available. Please contact support@bettercloud.com with if you have any questions.

We have received reports indicating that some O365 integrations may be disconnecting unexpectedly. We are currently investigating the issue. We will provide further updates as more details become available. Please contact support@bettercloud.com with any questions or concerns.

We have continued to monitor this issue and have determined that Zoom data syncs in app.bettercloud.com are now operating as expected. We are moving this incident to a Resolved state. 

A subset of affected customers will need to reconnect their Zoom Integration with valid credentials. Those customers will receive an email from notifications@bettercloud.com within the next 24 hours asking them to reconnect their Zoom Integration. 

We apologize for any inconvenience this issue may have caused. Please reach out to our support team by emailing support@bettercloud.com if you have any questions

We have identified and fixed the issue impacting Zoom data syncs for the majority customers in app.bettercloud.com. Zoom data is now syncing in normally and we are monitoring our system for stability. 

Our investigation revealed that for a subset of impacted customers Zoom Integrations were not syncing correctly. Those customers will need to reconnect their Zoom Integration with valid credentials. Those customers will receive an email from support@bettercloud.com within the next 24 hours asking them to reconnect their Zoom Integration.

We apologize for any inconvenience this issue may have caused. Please reach out to our support team by emailing support@bettercloud.com if you have any questions

We apologize for any inconvenience and will post updates as we know more. Please reach out to our support team by emailing support@bettercloud.com if you have any questions.

Please note that as we reprocess the delayed emails, some users may receive duplicates of emails that were already sent. We will provide another update as soon as possible. If you have any questions, please contact Support: support@bettercloud.com

We are currently investigating an issue that is impacting the visibility of the Discover Application user counts in the UI.  We apologize for any inconvenience and will provide another update as soon as possible. If you have any questions, please contact Support: support@bettercloud.com

incidents.name: Discover Application UI Not Loading Properly

incident_updates.body: We have resolved the issue that was affecting the visibility of the Discover Application user counts in the UI, and everything should be back to normal. We appreciate your patience! If you have any questions, please contact Support: support@bettercloud.com

We are currently investigating an issue that is impacting the visibility of the Discover Application user counts in the UI.  We apologize for any inconvenience and will provide another update as soon as possible. If you have any questions, please contact Support: support@bettercloud.com

incidents.name: Workflow delays and Workflow manage inconsistancy

incident_updates.body:
We have monitored the system overnight and Workflows triggered via the Platform API and Custom Triggers remain stable. The Workflow Builder and Manager page remain stable as well. 

We are moving this incident to a "Resolved" state. If you have any questions, please contact Support by reaching out to support@bettercloud.com

We have taken action to fix the issue. Workflows triggered via the Platform API and Custom Triggers are triggering normally and the workflow builder and manage pages are loads properly. We are continuing to monitor the performance to ensure that everything is back to normal. If you have any questions, please contact Support: support@bettercloud.com

We are currently investigating an issue that is resulting in an intermittent failure to load that has a limited impacted on the the workflow builder and manage page. Workflows triggered via the Platform API and Custom Triggers may be delayed. We apologize for any inconvenience and will provide another update as soon as possible. If you have any questions, please contact Support: support@bettercloud.com

We are moving this incident to a resolved state after monitoring for stability throughout the day. Thank you for your patience. If you have any questions, please contact our Support Team at support@bettercloud.com

Workflows were processing normally as of 2:30AM EST. We are continuing to monitor for any further issues to ensure system stability. If you have any questions, please contact our Support Team at support@bettercloud.com

We have implemented a fix and Workflows are now processing as expected for the customers who were affected. We will continue monitoring this issue for the next several hours and provide another update at 9:00AM EST. We apologize for any inconvenience this issue may have caused. If you have any questions, please contact our Support Team at support@bettercloud.com

We are investigating an issue that is causing Workflows to be delayed in executing for some customers. We are working to resolve this issue as soon as possible and will provide updates here as we work towards a resolution. If you have any questions, please contact our Support Team at support@bettercloud.com

We have resolved the issue that was the UI portion of the Data Protection section in app.bettercloud.com, and everything should be back to normal. We appreciate your patience! If you have any questions, please contact Support: support@bettercloud.com
We are continuing to investigate this issue.

We are currently investigating an issue that is affecting the UI portion of the Data Protection section in app.bettercloud.com. Please note that the workflows and alerts are continuing to perform as expected. We apologize for any inconvenience and will provide another update as soon as possible. If you have any questions, please contact Support: support@bettercloud.com
This incident has been resolved.

This incident has been resolved as of 12:30PM EST. We apologize for any inconvenience this issue may have caused. If you have any questions, please contact our Support Team at support@bettercloud.com.

We are investigating an issue that is causing specific Workflow Actions to be delayed in execution. We are working to resolve this issue as soon as possible and will provide updates here as we work towards a resolution. If you have any questions, please contact our Support Team at support@bettercloud.com.

incidents.name: Delay in Workflows and Workflow Actions

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.

We are investigating an issue that is causing Workflows and Workflow Actions to be delayed in execution. We are working to resolve this issue as soon as possible and will provide updates here as we work towards a resolution. If you have any questions, please contact our Support Team at support@bettercloud.com
This incident has been resolved.

We are continuing to investigate and monitor the performance of the Box file syncs and will provide updates as needed. If you have any questions, please contact our Support team: support@bettercloud.com.

We have implemented a fix that has remediated a known Box file sync issue. We are still investigating whether there might be other Box file sync issues that require remediation. We will continue to provide updates here. If you have any questions, please contact our Support team: support@bettercloud.com

We are currently investigating an issue that is impacting Box syncs, which may include Box files or folder syncs. This issue only affects a subset of customers with Box integrations. We apologize for any inconvenience and will provide another update once available. If you have any questions, please contact Support: support@bettercloud.com
This incident has been resolved.

Due to a Salesforce outage, our in-app chat widget and help center may be intermittently unavailable at this time. To reach our Support team, please email support@bettercloud.com. Please note that responses will be delayed until our Salesforce access is restored. We will provide updates here as more information becomes available.

We have concluded our investigation and determined that the issue impacting OneLogin data syncs in app.bettercloud.com has been resolved.  

Customers may have experienced intermittent issues with OneLogin data syncing into app.bettercloud.com between 6/28/22 and 7/15/22, which could have affected OneLogin based Alerts and Workflows from triggering or completing successfully.

We apologize for any inconvenience this issue may have caused. Please reach out to our support team by emailing support@bettercloud.com if you have any questions.

We are currently investigating an issue impacting OneLogin data syncs in app.bettercloud.com. Customers may experience delays in their OneLogin data syncing in, which could affect OneLogin based Alerts and Workflows from triggering or completing successfully. We apologize for the inconvenience this issue is causing and will post updates as we know more. Please reach out to our support team by emailing support@bettercloud.com if you have any questions.
